channel.title: Odd issue with the server?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I am using the server Aggroth and I was wondering how you would change the starting gameframe. When I go to login, it starts at a 474 Gameframe, however it says that it's 562. And when I change it to the real 562, and log out it goes back to a 474 gameframe. It gets really tedious to keep doing this over and over again. Any help would be much appreciated, thank you :)
Cheers,
Lunar Paradise
